summary: Provides a registry and helper utilities that supply Hypothesis strategies for generating random values conforming to Ethereum ABI types (integers, unsigned integers, fixed‑point numbers, byte arrays, tuples, etc.), supporting property‑based testing of ABI encoding and decoding logic.
business_intent: Facilitate automated, thorough testing of Ethereum ABI handling by supplying ready‑made strategies to produce valid random inputs, thereby improving the reliability and correctness of encoding/decoding implementations.
